Cruise Automation | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE

Cruise is building the future of autonomous vehicles. We believe in improving people’s lives by making transportation safer, more accessible, and more convenient.

Our team is small and we move quickly. We’re currently testing a fully driverless solution on city streets. We're looking for smart, ambitious people to help build the world’s largest fleet of driverless cars. We are solving some of the hardest problems in the world right now and building some of the coolest technology you have ever seen.

Our office is located in SOMA(SF) and is full of cars and robots and the brilliant people building them.

We are looking to fill a number of engineering roles, if any of them seem interesting to you please feel free to email me directly Asimile@getcruise.com
